title: CLASSIFIED SECTION - ALL ADVERTS REQUIRE A PRICE

posts.content:
please read the following for sale guidlines.

firstly absolutly no "offers"! a price followed by "or offers" is acceptable.
(if your unsure of an asking price then post up with an ono "or nearest offer"

location is a must!!!

links to ebay are just as bad as posts not having prices on and are just plain frustrating

_________dibs____________________

"dibs" on the ssvc for sale forum goes like so,

1, if you would like to purchase somthing on the forum then its "first dibs"!!! following up with a pm to sort payment details.
(this is clear to the seller that you are intending to purchase the item)

2,if you would like some more info on the item then either post up the question and pm them.

3, "first dibs" (thus securing the item) and then asking for pics or further information is frowned upon!!

frowned upon also is negative or non contributary commenting on a for sale thread!!!!

if you`ve multiple items then its often a good idea to merge them all together in a single thread.

please note that if a seller advertises his goods elsewhere then there is a chance it might sell elsewhere!!!!
likewise the seller has the right to sell to whom he wishes!

goods sell frequently by pm (its fact of life, it happens!!)
dont forget the seller has his own perogative who he sells to (again a fact of life)
if a mod pm`s you and asks you to price the item and you dont it will be deleted/or locked.

ambiguity is also a fact and it rears its ugly head only to often so these simple guidlines are in place to make the section a friendlier place
